title: Workshop on Utilizing Open Educational Resources for Anti-Racist Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific research methodology and educational administration experience
context.additional_context: Anti-racism scenario-based learning reflecting real-world problems

learning_goals: Participants can design a bias analysis tool for scientific fields using Open Educational Resources (OER)
Participants can present at least three case studies of applying anti-racist pedagogy in VR simulation environments
Participants can create a content checklist considering cultural inclusivity when developing open educational resources

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
